alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dooly; Houston; Pulaski; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 7:10PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pulaski, southwestern Twiggs, west central Bleckley, northern Dooly and Houston Counties through 800 PM EST ... At 710 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Moss Oak to near Flint River Wma, and moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Hawkinsville, Unadilla, Byromville, Pinehurst, Lilly, Dooling, Hayneville, Browndale, Tarversville, Meadowdale, Houston Lake, Elko, Grove Park, District Path, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Moss Oak, Kathleen, Sand Bed, and Grovania. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
